sentences.en: Analyses the feature and cardinal principle of the no - duct inductive ventilation system.
sentences.cn: 分析了无风管诱导通风系统的特点及基本原理.

sentences.en: Bacon's greatest contribution to philosophy was the inductive method.
sentences.cn: 培根对哲学最伟大的贡献是归纳法.

sentences.en: Design inductive heating & welding machine under the consideration of EMC regulation?
sentences.cn: 在考虑到EMC规则的情况下如何来设计感应加热设备 和 焊机?

sentences.en: He never has to wonder or resort to inductive reasoning.
sentences.cn: 他从来都不用猜测,也不靠逻辑推理.

sentences.en: How to build inductive heating & welding machines step by step?
sentences.cn: 如何一步一步的来设计感应加热设备 和 焊机?

sentences.en: Inductive reasoning moves from specific details to broader generalizations.
sentences.cn: 归纳推理是从具体中归纳普遍的规律.

sentences.en: Instrument compressors with microphones, pressure transducers, inductive transducers for displacement, laser, etc.
sentences.cn: 在压缩机上安装麦克风 、 压力传感器 、 感应式位移传感器 、 激光传感器等.

sentences.en: Maintenance in the following ways: try not to inductive load.
sentences.cn: 保养的方法包括: 尽量不接电感性负载.

sentences.en: The article analyze the problems with comparative - quantitative analysis method and Inductive - deductive methods.
sentences.cn: 文章力求运用比较和数量分析方法及归纳和演绎相结合的方式分析与论证问题.

sentences.en: The inductive effect decreases with increasing distance.
sentences.cn: 诱导效应随着距离的增加而减弱.

sentences.en: The most widely used single - axis inductive pickoff is the microsyn.
sentences.cn: 最广泛应用的单轴感应式信号传感器是微动同步器.

sentences.en: The superelectrons present an inductive impedance.
sentences.cn: 超导电子表现出一种感抗.

sentences.en: The thesis mainly researches on inductive displacement sensor for AMB.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了用于磁悬浮轴承系统的电感式位移传感器.

sentences.en: The writer uses study methodology and analytical inductive method.
sentences.cn: 本文采用行动研究法和分析归纳法.

sentences.en: When the core is displaced, the inductive reactance of the secondary coil is unbalanced.
sentences.cn: 当铁芯移动时, 次线圈的感抗就不平衡.
